Body: How do you create a circular google map? So far I have a LinearLayout with 3 frame layouts inside it. So a Top Frame, Map Frame, Bottom Frame. I can change the height and width of the Map. But I can't add curvature or set a radius, nor does android:shape= "oval" work. My Map.Java Extends AppCompatActivity. Here is my activity_map.xml                My content_map.xmlHow I want the circular map to look and what I have right now:
Title: Trying to create a circular google map, MapFragment is rectangle right now

history.Text: How do you create a circular google map? So far I have a LinearLayout with 3 frame layouts inside it. So a Top Frame, Map Frame, Bottom Frame. I can change the height and width of the Map. But I can't add curvature or set a radius, nor does android:shape= "oval" work. My Map.Java Extends AppCompatActivity. How do you create a circular google map? So far I have a LinearLayout with 3 frame layouts inside it. So a Top Frame, Map Frame, Bottom Frame. I can change the height and width of the Map. But I can't add curvature or set a radius, nor does android:shape= "oval" work. My Map.Java Extends AppCompatActivity.
